kodkod.engine
Class Solver

java.lang.Object
  kodkod.engine.Solver

public final class Solver
extends java.lang.Object

Implementation of a computational engine for solving relational formulae. A formula is solved with respect to given bounds.

Author:
Emina Torlak
specfield:
solverName: SATSolverName // name of the SAT solver used by this solver
timeout: int // timeout for the solver, in seconds

Constructor Detail

Solver

public Solver(Solver.SATSolverName solverName,
              int timeout)
Constructs a new Solver, that will use the SAT solver with the given name and abort computation within the specified number of seconds, if necessary. If timeout is 0, then calls to solve will be allowed to run as long as necessary to obtain a solution

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - - solver = null
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - timeout < 0
effects:
this.solverName' = solverName && this.timeout' = timeout

Solver

public Solver(Solver.SATSolverName solverName)
Constructs a new Solver, that will use the SAT solver with the given name and allow calls to this.solve to run as long as necessary to obtain a solution

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - - solver = null
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - solver with the given name is not available
effects:
this.solverName' = solverName && this.timeout' = 0

Solver

public Solver(int timeout)
Constructs a new Solver that will use the default SAT solver with the and abort computation within the specified number of seconds, if necessary.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - timeout < 0
effects:
this.solverName' = Default && this.timeout' = timeout

numberOfPrimaryVariables

public int numberOfPrimaryVariables()
Returns the number of primary CNF variables generated while executing the last call to solve(Formula, Bounds). If the solve method has not been called yet, returns -1.

Returns:
the number of primary CNF variables generated by the most recent call to solve(Formula, Bounds), or -1 if the method has not been called yet.

numberOfIntermediateVariables

public int numberOfIntermediateVariables()
Returns the number of intermediate CNF variables generated while executing the last call to solve(Formula, Bounds). If the solve method has not been called yet, returns -1.

Returns:
the number of intermediate CNF variables generated by the most recent call to solve(Formula, Bounds), or -1 if the method has not been called yet.

numberOfClauses

public int numberOfClauses()
Returns the number of CNF clauses generated while executing the last call to solve(Formula, Bounds). If the solve method has not been called yet, returns -1.

Returns:
the number of CNF clauses generated by the most recent call to solve(Formula, Bounds), or -1 if the method has not been called yet.

solve

public Instance solve(Formula formula,
                      Bounds bounds)
               throws TimeoutException
Attempts to satisfy the given formula with respect to the specified instance. If the operation is successful, the method returns a Model of the formula (in conjunction with constraints implied by the instance). If the formula and the instance constraints cannot be satisfied, null is returned. If the solver runs out of time, a TimeoutException is thrown.

Returns:
Model of the formula if it is satisfiable with respect to the instance; null otherwise.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - - formula = null || bounds = null
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - the formula contains an unbound variable
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - the formula contains a relation not mapped by the given bounds object
TimeoutException - - it takes more than this.timeout of seconds to solve the formula

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
